content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Non-Functional requirements\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While building the solutions, we all need to focus on quality of the products, their reliability, interoperability and others architecturally significant quality attributes. BSS and Digital Platform within it require a set of mandatory attributes that we should follow.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Authorization & authentication\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Access.epam.com / IAM\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SSO is a feature of access control for multiple related but independent software systems. With this feature, users sign in once and get access to all systems without being prompted to log in again to each of them. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://Access.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Access.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (IAM) is the new SSO and is intended to replace the old \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://login.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"login.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" service and support new features required for EPAM growth. IAM covers all the complexity of integration with lots of social networks having different APIs. In this way, you can integrate just one system and get access to many social networks.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMEAGBSS/EPAM+SSO+Integration\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM SSO Integration\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Owners/Contacts: EPM-IGA\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Performance\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The quality attribute in Software Architecture shows the system's response to performing certain actions for a certain period. Performance is one of the critical indicators for applications within the Digital Platform and each DM and the team must understand how to measure, monitor, and control it, and how to deal with the numbers in amber-red zones.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWMSDM/Performance\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Performance\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Availability\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The quality attribute in Software Architecture shows an ability to continue to operate under predefined conditions and is expressed as the ratio of the available system time to the total working time. Availability is one of the critical indicators for applications within the Digital Platform and each application has periods of unavailability. The goal of DM and the delivery team is to know how to measure and monitor it. EPAM infrastructure is complex and has its own factors of unavailability. It is also important to understand them and investigate unavailability reasons regularly.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWMSDM/Availability\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Availability\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security requirements are a class of Non-Functional Requirements (NFRs) that relate to system confidentiality, integrity, and availability. Explicitly stating security requirements during project inception is the perfect complement to security testing. The main purposes of security requirements are:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Gather and summarize the client’s expectations.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Perform risk assessment.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Gather any information that can influence architecture and implementation to handle on the early stage the issues that may arise.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSSDL/EPAM+Digital+Platform+Application+Security+Program+and+Secure-SDLC+KB\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM are several significant security requirements for all the products (you can find them all \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=543934316\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") that we want to highlight.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security Baseline Assessment\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On each project, Delivery Manager is accountable, and Security Champion is responsible for the initial Security Baseline Assessment as well as for the continuous execution of all Secure-SDLC activities.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security Baseline Assessment must be passed by EPAM applications before they are in production.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSSDL/Security+Baseline+Assessment\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security Baseline Assessment \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Secrets Management and Data Encryption\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Secrets management introduce many challenges that must be solved by a development team. Beside secure storage of secrets, you should understand who is accessing which secrets, and this is already very difficult and platform-specific. Adding on key rolling and detailed audit logs is almost impossible without a custom solution. This is where \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSSDL/Vault\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Vault\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" steps in. Vault is a tool for securely accessing secrets, such as API keys, passwords, or certificates. Vault provides a unified interface to any secret, while ensuring tight access control and recording a detailed audit log. It also can handle leasing, key revocation and key rolling.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSSDL/HashiCorp+Vault\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HashiCorp Vault\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSSDL/Secrets+Management+and+Data+Encryption\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Secrets Management and Data Encryption\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security Information and Event Management (SIEM)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) software has been in use in various guises for over a decade and has evolved significantly during that time. SIEM solutions provide a holistic view of what is happening on a network in real-time and help IT teams to be more proactive in the fight against security threats.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSSDL/Security+Information+and+Event+Management+%28SIEM%29+Integration\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) Integration\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"File upload protection\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each application in EPAM Digital Platform stores attachments in their custom developed file storages, process attachments differently, sometimes without proper security measures and files sanitation. The application should perform filtering and content checking on any files that are uploaded to a server. Files should be thoroughly scanned and validated before becoming available to other users. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Purpose of\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSSDL/Epam+FileStorage+Solution\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM File Storage Solution\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is to provide the enterprise-level file storage and distribution service with first-class security features that include malware scanning and a unique system of data sanitization powered by OPSWAT Metadefender Core.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSSDL/File+upload+protection\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"File upload protection\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data Privacy\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personally identifiable data (PII) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is any data that could potentially identify a specific individual. It is any information that can be used to distinguish one person from another and can be used for de-anonymizing anonymous data.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In EPAM, all personal data, when collected, should be processed as required by regional laws, such as GDPR, CCPA, № 94-V, № ЗРУ-547, China's Cybersecurity Law, etc. Data Privacy Compliance risks are addressed to EPAM's product Account Managers, Delivery Supervisors and Delivery Managers, who are held accountable for decisions taken on their products toward Data Privacy compliance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMPIID/EPM-PIID+Home\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPM-PIID\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - EPAM Knowledge Base\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
